title: FS: T210 McCreery Series 8 PSA 2 SOLD
author: tbob

posts.post_title: FS: T210 McCreery Series 8 PSA 2 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Original and authentic T210 Old Mill McCreery from the tough 8th Series. Graded PSA 2.5. Nice eye appeal. SOLD

Winning bidder pays $3.50 shipping. Thanks for looking.

Hey, Bob,

I'll take it.

Cheers, Mike

Thanks Mike. Nice card, I bought it and found out I already had one. 
Check or PayPal is fine, PayPal addy is my email address.

Send me your mailing address and I'll get it right out.

Bob
Nice to see a thread featuring TBob and Mike Peich, two of the grand men of the hobby.
